#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	long t;
	long n,i,avg,sum,ans,a[100000],counter;
	cin>>t;
	counter=0;
	while(t!=0)
	{
		counter+=1;
		//cin>>n;
		n=t;
		sum=0;
		ans=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>a[i];
			sum+=a[i];
		}
		avg=sum/n;
		//cout<<avg<<endl;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			if(a[i]>avg)
				ans+=(a[i]-avg);
		cout<<"Set #"<<counter<<endl;
    	cout<<"The minimum number of moves is "<<ans<<"."<<endl;
		cin>>t;		
	}
	return 0;
}
